about_the_game:
Explore, build, fight and survive in an enchanting cartoon world! Take control of Gombo, your very own animated character, and adventure through a beautiful, yet unforgiving world full of dangers and surprises.

  • Show them who's boss
Fight your way through a wide cast of imaginative creatures as you adventure through Gombo's cheerful world! Who knows the secrets it may be hiding from you... You will find multiple dungeons, monsters and bosses all ready to take you on.

  • A brand new world to explore
Explore multiple randomly generated areas with various whimsical themes! Each area has its own creatures, ecosystem, structures, and of course... Unique treasures to find! As you explore Gombo's world, you will also meet a colourful cast of fantastical characters ready to help you out on your journey. Find materials or complete quests for them in order to earn exclusive rewards!

  • You are the star
Each and every Gombo is YOUR Gombo! Express yourself by changing your character's colours and outfits to your will. You may also find rideable mounts and animated pets on your journey if you're lucky enough.

  • Home Sweet Home
Tired of fighting? No problem! Take a break and build your dream house in any environment you want. Decorate it with delightful decorations you will find on your travels, and make sure you make yourself feel at home.

  • What about my friends?
Are you scared of going alone? No problem! Team up with up to 4 of your friends and go on an adventure together!... Or fight against them, and show them who's the ultimate Gombo here.
